name: Santa Maria Harbour Resort

reviews.title: Keep Going Back
reviews.text: Don't need too many words to express our satisfaction. Spent the month of March. This was our 4th year and we've made reservations for next Marth too. The place in convenient to everything. Couldn't ask for a nicer place.Of course getting past Times Square at the North end of the island, is another matter.

reviews.title: Santa Maria in Ft. Myers Beach is a Nice Place exactly as described
reviews.text: Was a little hesitant since the only review I could find said they had ants - we stayed for 7 days and had NO ants!

reviews.title: a relaxing weeks
reviews.text: we had a weeks on the gulf cost at the end of october & the family of 4 really enjoyed the resort, it is on the in land side of fort Myerss, but beach access is just a few minues walk away

The kids really enjoyed to great pool & being able to fish from the dock at the back of the property , boat hire is across the water. Along with a very quiet beach just few minutes away with Dolphins swiming in the sea, it is a great relaxing location.
reviews.title: Wonderful Week
Very, very clean!!!!!!
reviews.text: We had originaly intended to stay in Sanibel , but with the huricaines , we chose fort myers instead, but we were not disapointed, the ' town houses ' are a good size & whist Sanibel is much smaller, Santa maria is at the quiet end of fort myers beach & just as relaxed, with easy access to all facilitys including the Publix in the middle of town if you are self catereing . Naples is just 10 minuites to the south & very up market

reviews.title: Good Value for Money
reviews.text: we can not wait to go back !!

reviews.title: Great resort!
reviews.text: We spent a wonderful week at the Santa Maria Resort last month, although we rented one of the privately owned condos. Fabulous pool and hot tub. Small degree of hurricane damage to decks and grounds. One downside is that we never located any nearby beach access. Nevertheless, the price and location are great. We would be happy to return.

reviews.title: Absolutely Fabulous!
reviews.text: There are so many pleasant things to say, I don't even know where to begin! My introduction to the Santa Maria Harbour Resort was meeting Ibrahim during check in. Ibrahim was a sweet man who assisted us with directions to the beach, places to eat, etc. Our room was upgraded to a beautiful 2 bedroom suite. The room was fabulous, not only did my friend and I each have our own bedrooms, but our own bathrooms too! The kitchen was fully stocked and very clean. There was a nice dining table, beautiful screened patio, and a nice seating area in the living room. The in-room washer/dryer was exceptionally handy as well!! The pool, bbq and shuffleboard area was always clean and there was never a lack of chairs, tables in which to sit and relax. I was totally impressed with Santa Maria Harbour Resort and would stay there again in a heartbeat!!

We stayed here with two kids in a 2 BR and loved it. A lot of space, quiet, everything you need (dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, big fridge, nice pool) and even manatees in the canal at the pool. After small hotel rooms before this was really recreation! The only problem: No direct beach access (you need approx. 5 minutes by car if you want a nice beach).
reviews.title: Meet manatees
Hidden Gem
reviews.text: I have been travelling round Orlando and Fort Myers Beach and booked a 2 bedroom suite for 2 nights for 16th sept 2005 on spec from the net.
It could not have been better, first class position, very comfortable, pleasant staff and the best bit, I was upgraded to a 2 bedroom townhouse with 2 balconies and very spacious rooms.
reviews.title: It was OK
Post Hurricane -You'd never know it happened!
reviews.text: would recommend this place to anyone, and hope to come back in 2 years time

aka: Santa Maria Harbour Hotel Fort Myers Beach
description: 60 luxurious 1, 2 & 3 bedroom suites, townhouses & penthouses with fully appointed kitchens, living & dining rooms, screened balconies, cable TV & more. 38 boat slips, deep water canal, pool, sauna, outdoor spas, BBQ and gazebo area, and a sandy beach nearby. Centrally located - walk to everything.
